        public static void setTrackingUser(android.content.Context context,
                   Integer committer)
        Set a user to be tracked. Do not set this to clear the tracked user, instead use clearTrackingUser(android.content.Context)
        Parameters:
        context - used to access SharedPreferences

      • getCurrentGerritName

        public static String getCurrentGerritName(android.content.Context context)
        Get the name of the current Gerrit instance. This uses the value saved in the shared preferences if there is one. Otherwise it will try and find its name. May return null if we don't have a name for it
